node.title: Mark Lanegan - Straight Songs Of Sorrow
node.description: The former Screaming Trees frontman. Queens of the Stone Age collaborator and friend of Kurt Cobain released his 12th solo album, Straight Songs Of Sorrow. his book Sing Backwards and Weep was released last week. he has clearly seen and experienced some shit in his life.
node.release: Straight Songs Of Sorrow was released through Heavenly Recordings on May 8, 2020.
